upfront fee.translation[0].definitions[0: In return for a $500 upfront fee, the broker promised to help Mr Haze find money.
upfront fee.translation[0].definitions[1: an amount of money paid by an investor to a MUTUAL FUND to manage their investment
An investor who places $10,000 for 15 years in a fund that charges an upfront fee of 0.75% of assets pays the equivalent of a $900 load.
